Detailed Description

The definition of a Collector (the parameters to IPDR_CreateSession()).

Field Documentation

The collector's (server's) IP address.

The collector's (server's) name.

The collector's (server's) "port".

int IPDR_Server::Priority
 

The collector's (server's) priority (lower number is higher priority).
